column1: What strategy did a global financial service institution use to transform HR?,How did fin. svcs. co. revamp HR ops?,"The global financial service institution transformed HR by hiring an executive from outside HR to lead the function, replacing 60 percent of direct reports with individuals from outside HR who had strong business acumen, cultural shaping abilities, and personal credibility, while also encouraging staff to surround themselves with talented HR professionals and develop necessary general business skills.","They chose an executive from outside HR to head the function.
